title: Kennen ult invisible
body: So just played a game as kennen i could see my ult but the enemy team couldn't apparently. obviously don't have any screen shots since i could still see it but lee and riven were very vocal about how annoying it is that they can't see it. don't know if it was just them or if it was everyone but just making the post.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
